name: 司潔妮
objective:
本課程培養學生職場必備的核心英文能力，主題包含英文履歷撰寫、商用英文書信、英文面試與簡報技巧、辦公室英文會話等。本課程同時加強學生基礎英文能力，如單字、文法、寫作等，並透過多元活動有系統性地發展英語溝通能力。
This course is designed to equip students with the necessary English communication skills in the workplace. The content will include English resume writing, business English, English interviews, briefing skills, and office English conversation. This course will also strengthen students’ basic English skills, such as vocabulary, grammar, and writing.
schedule:
W1  [Online job search] (1) Job application; 
W2  [Online job search] (2) Cover letter; Personal profile
W3  [Introductions & Interviews] (1) Self-introduction; Before an interview
W4  [Introductions & Interviews] (2) Resume; Presentation skills
W5  [Breaking the Ice] (1) Speed networking; making conversation
W6  [Breaking the Ice] (2) Socializing; Small talk
W7  Review 1; in-class activity; Presentation skills
W8  Midterm Project 1/2
W9  Midterm Project 2/2
W10  [Writing Emails & Messages] (1) Email tips; voice messages
W11  [Writing Emails & Messages] (2) Text messages; Effective communication
W12  [Answering Calls] (1) Phone call etiquette; Phone messages
W13  [Answering Calls] (2) Business etiquette; Listening skills & Taking notes
W14  [Organizing Meetings] (1) A meeting agenda; schedule conflicts
W15  [Organizing Meetings] (2) Reserving a conference room; Presentation skills
W16  Review; in-class activity; Presentation skills
W17  Final Project 1/2 
W18  Final Project 2/2
scorePolicy:

Participation & Quizzes: 20%

Bonus points: 1-3% for each work; up to 10%

* Any student who accumulates FIVE unexcused absences in the semester class will be placed in a no-credit status. 無故缺席 5 次，即無法獲得本課程學分。
